content: star trek magic_ring spock amigurumi is approximately 5 5 inches tall using 2 0 mm hook materials 8/4 cotton yarn purchased at hobbii com black nude blue and yellow color yarn 2 0 mm crochet hook 8 mm safety eyes sewing needle scissors stitch marker embroidery thread black color pink blush make-up ========================================== abbreviations r= row rounds single_crochet= single_crochet double_crochet=double_crochet increase= increase decrease=decrease slip_stitch= slip_stitch magic_ring=magic_ring chain=chain fo= fasten_off blo= back loop only tag me on instagram @ handmade crochi happy crocheting live long and prosper
